name: VIP
overview: Step into the glamorous shoes of TV's baddest and blondest detective in V.I.P. for the Game Boy Color. You are Vallery Irons, a beautiful Los Angeles private eye (played by Pamela Anderson in the hit syndicated show). It's your dangerous duty to track down a famous movie star who has mysteriously vanished into thin air. But you aren't alone you're aided in your action-packed adventure by your V.I.P. team members: intelligence agent Tasha Dexter, martial arts specialist Johnny Loh, explosives expert Nikki Franco, weapons expert Quick Williams, and computer expert Kay Simmons. In V.I.P. you'll do it all drive sleek sportscars and take to the sea in a powerful speedboat, strap on rollerblades, and even blaze through the skies in a helicopter. All of the tongue-in-cheek humor and bullet-blasting, car-crashing mayhem of Pamela's television antics are here to be devoured in hours of Game Boy Color exploits.
